fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- {At night,} choose a player {other than yourself}. You will be given their rolecard, which you may add {one set of} curly brackets to. They will be {notified that this happe}ned.
- **Cleave** all text in curly brackets {on your rolecard} during the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause someone to die as a direct result of cleaving.
